channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: ABC Pulls Jimmy Kimmel “Indefinitely” for Charlie Kirk Shooter Comments
item.description: 🎵 Jimmy Kimmel out? ABC shakes things up after controversial comments 🤯 Who else is curious to see what happens next? 👀 #MusicNews

item.title: Aerosmith Team With Yungblud For First New Music In 12 Years
item.description: 🚀 Rock legends Aerosmith join forces with the dynamic Yungblud for a musical comeback that's 12 years in the making! 🎸✨ #Aerosmith #Yungblud #NewMusic

item.title: Miley Cyrus Announces New Songs With Lindsey Buckingham, David Byrne
item.description: 🚀 Miley Cyrus teaming up with legends Lindsey Buckingham and David Byrne for epic new tunes! 🎶 Get ready for a wild musical ride! 🔥 #MileyCyrus #MusicCollab

item.title: Yungblud Brings Rock-Star Energy to Brooklyn: Review, Photos + Video
item.description: 🎸 Rock out with @yungblud in Brooklyn! See all the epic moments - photos and video on our site now! 🤘 #Yungblud #RockStarEnergy

item.title: Bob Dylan Announces Bootleg Series Volume 18: Through The Open Window, 1956-1963
item.description: 🎶 Dive into Bob Dylan's musical archives with the new Bootleg Series Volume 18! 🎸✨ #BobDylan #MusicHistory
